channel.title: Adding walls, buildings, roofs, wall decorations?
channel.description:
in my source, it says the object types are this: [code]ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects 4-8 wall decoration 9: diag.walls 10-11 world objects 12-21: roofs 22: floor decoration[/code]
but i made a range of objects using each object type, and only those with 10 and 11 showed up. Does the object have to be designed for the specific type or something? all help would be appreciated.

item.title: Adding walls, buildings, roofs, wall decorations?
item.dc:creator: @Burning_fangs Burning fangs
item.description:
@Burning_fangs wrote:

in my source, it says the object types are this:

ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects 4-8 wall decoration 9: diag.walls 10-11 world objects 12-21: roofs 22: floor decoration

but i made a range of objects using each object type, and only those with 10 and 11 showed up.
Does the object have to be designed for the specific type or something?
all help would be appreciated.
